title: Product Management
description: Efficiently manage and organize your products. Easily add, edit, and delete products. Categorize and tag your products for more precise searching.

title: Online Store
description: Create your own online store and reach more customers. Customize the design and appearance of your store. Accept online payments securely and offer flexible shipping options.

title: Reservations and Appointments
description: Allow your customers to schedule appointments and services. Provide an availability calendar and booking options. Send automatic reminders to reduce cancellations.

title: Inventory Management
description: Maintain accurate control of your inventory and stock. Receive alerts when products are low in stock. Manage multiple locations and product variants.

title: Sales Tracking
description: Analyze sales and your business performance. Generate detailed reports on sales, income, and trends. Identify the most popular products and areas for improvement.

title: Marketing Tools
description: Promote your products and services with effective strategies. Create email campaigns and discounts. Optimize your store's SEO for greater online reach.
